captions.text: Subscribe to our english channel: Everything about your pet!
https://www.youtube.com/user/allaboutyourpet
Dear friends
physical exercise for our pets is as important
as our own.
if we don't take them out, they will become stiff and lazy, and will
also have problems because the sunlight is and fresh air is good for them,
so if you have the chance to take them out in a nice sunny day
like today, making sure that the temperature is between 18 and 25 degrees
and if its shiny, we can
take them out for a walk.
The sun is very important for the body  calcium absortion
so if they are out in the sun these sunny days...THAT'S GREAT!!
So how can me make them run around? They do this naturally
so they know when they need exercise, as soon as you place them out
in a wide space
they will immediately start to run, and stretch and to
play
I have Goofy here with me to show you a little of what I mean
Goofy is a small rabbit 3 months old, he is on a lead
it is slightly too big but as it comes
with this sort of shirt like the ones you can find for dogs, the first days
that we take him out
we will put his lead on even if he finds it slightly uncomfortable, but we will let him get used to it
this is a completely
normal process
but now we will place him inside a playpen, because one of the best ideas is that I want you to see
the playpen, you can find these in any garden shop or pet shop
because it is a very good way of having them controlled and avoiding them running away
also look, I here show you that
woops!!!  depending on each pet, chinchillas make very big jumps
and in these type of playpens they can run away, right? mine
is Winny I have her perfectly trained and she will not run away
I'm lucky to have my own garden, and I have them in my house
you can do this in both a public or private garden
you can take them out into the countryside but always on a lead, right?
this is the best way to have them controlled
but with this height
you will not have any problem with rabbits neither guinea pigs, so if you want
to come with me, I will place Goofy in the playpen.
See when you leave them outside, make sure to fins places with
half sun and half shade, now you will see Goofy and all his friends
eating a bunch of things that we can find outside in the garden, this is absolutely normal
they can eat grass, they can eat the leaves fallen from the trees,
no problem, they know what they can and cannot eat so
if you see a bunch of leaves that have recently fallen from the trees
and they eat them, don't worry, just stay there and have a look at them
you will see how much they enjoy themselves.

title: TRUCOS Y CONSEJOS - Cómo sacar a la calle a mi mascota
